name: Scanning the QR code and viewing credential details
scenarioId: android/Issuing-Support_for_credential_offer-Issuer_initiated_scenario_25/Issuing-Support_for_credential_offer-Issuer_initiated_scenario_85/credentialOfferCrossDevice:Scanning the QR code and viewing credential details
methodName: Scanning the QR code and viewing credential details

testSteps.description: Given the QR code scanner is activated
When the user scans a QR code from the issuer service
Then the details of the credential to be issued should be displayed including the type of credential and the issuer name

userStory.storyName: Credential issuance process for cross device
userStory.displayName: Credential issuance process for cross device
userStory.narrative:
As a user of the issuer service
  I want to be able to issue a credential
  So that it can be securely added to my EUDI Wallet

title: Scanning the QR code and viewing credential details
